funnels.title: AdSense RPM Spark — Estimate Real Earnings
funnels.description: Quick, realistic AdSense RPM estimates for small sites. Try a traffic sample and see likely earnings.
patterns: If your site gets {topic} visitors, here's the likely monthly revenue
Why {topic} topics often overestimate ad income (and how to avoid it)
Simple RPM ranges that real creators use for {topic}

funnels.title: Traffic to $100 — Reverse Engineer Your Goal
funnels.description: Enter a niche or example and get a quick traffic target to hit $100/day with realistic CTR/RPM.
patterns: To hit $100/day with {topic}, you probably need X visitors at Y conversion
Most people forget this about {topic} niches — conversion matters more than traffic
A simple CTR/RPM combo that shows how close {topic} is to $100/day
